attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the cases where unscrupulous managers / directors get obscene payouts / pensions after clearly failing at their jobs.
Should the payout not be declined or renegotiated to a far lower level then a 'Failure Tax' should apply.

This tax should be at such a level that it acts a deterrent to failure or (where public monies are involved) recoup some of the losses the public have suffered.
